hotelinTaif: Welcome to the foremost resort in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.And we are pleased to welcome you to be our guests in Awaliv International Hotel, since it represents the epitome of hospitality the city of roses.
poolAndGym: Besides it is remarked by its spectacular design, along with the latest innovations and the diverse models provided in its housing units.
restaurantWithAView: In this regard, we consider providing optimum services for our guests by all our friendly and helpful employee is to be one of our main objectives.
peacefulHotelStay: Thus, we would like to take this opportunity to welcome you warmly, and we are sure that you will find the perfect place to enjoy all our services.
getawayDescription: Exclusive Summer Getaway at Awaliv International Hotel - Indulge in Luxury, Comfort, and Scenic Views of Taif

singleRoom.title: Single Room
singleRoom.amenities five: Access to fitness center and pool

apartment.title: Luxury Apartment
apartment.amenities one: Spacious living area with modern furniture
apartment.amenities two: Fully equipped kitchen with dining area
apartment.amenities tree: Large windows with panoramic city views
apartment.amenities six: Two luxurious bathrooms with premium toiletries
apartment.amenities seven: Access to exclusive gym and swimming pool

discoverSubtitle: Our staff makes every effort to achieve your desires and aspirations. by providing all the entertainment and activities that will guarantee you a wonderful stay and a unique experience.

In-room dining service.title: In-room dining service
In-room dining service.description: You can scan the QR code on your mobile to show you the in-room dining menu.

Housekeeping.title: Housekeeping
Housekeeping.description: Housekeeping service is provided daily, and could be more when needed.

Free Wi-Fi.title: Free Wi-Fi
Free Wi-Fi.description: Free Wi-Fi is available at the hotel.

Safe.title: Safe
Safe.description: Each room contains a private safe to keep your belongings.

Mini Bar.title: Mini Bar
Mini Bar.description: It contains a collection of snacks and drinks.

Iron and Board.title: Iron and Board
Iron and Board.description: The room is provided with an iron with an ironing board, kept inside your closet.

Qiblah, and Tools of Worship.title: Qiblah, and Tools of Worship
Qiblah, and Tools of Worship.description: Each room is equipped with the direction of prayer Qiblah, a prayer rug, and a Mus'haf (a copy of the Holy Quran).

Extra Pillows.title: Extra Pillows
Extra Pillows.description: For your convenience, you can have different types of pillows upon request.

Bed making service.title: Bed making service
Bed making service.description: This service is provided in the evening to ensure a comfortable stay by closing the curtains, placing cloth shoes next to the bed, and preparing the beds for sleeping.

Shoe polishing service upon request.title: Shoe polishing service upon request
Shoe polishing service upon request.description: Cleaning shoes from dirt and dust, applying varnish to the shoes that matches the color of the shoes and polishing them, and polishing the shoes with a hand brush and a dry cloth.

On-demand tailoring service.title: On-demand tailoring service
On-demand tailoring service.description: Providing simple alteration and repair services for clothes based on guests’ requests to ensure their comfort.

Valet parking service.title: Valet parking service
Valet parking service.description: Where customers’ cars are parked by professional staff to meet guests’ requirements and park their cars in safe parking lots.

Central safe.title: Central safe
Central safe.description: Located in the reception area where you can keep your valuables in your own safes with complete confidentiality and security.

Limousine service.title: Limousine service
Limousine service.description: Limousine service is available upon request.

Concierge service.title: Concierge service
Concierge service.description: Providing special services to guests such as restaurant reservations, coordinating trips and events, and providing transportation solutions for guests.

Currency Exchange.title: Currency Exchange
Currency Exchange.description: Since Saudi Arabia's local currency, you can exchange currency at the reception desk.

Business Center.title: Business Center
Business Center.description: The business center provides all secretariat functions and business services.

Personal Luggage Service.title: Personal Luggage Service
Personal Luggage Service.description: Luggage porters in the hotel would be pleased to help you carrying your luggage to your room and store them.

Transportation From/to the Airport.title: Transportation From/to the Airport
Transportation From/to the Airport.description: Transportation From/to the Airport is available upon request.

Health Club.title: Health Club
Health Club.description: Sauna, steam room, massages, swimming pool And GYM.

exploreCity: EXPLORE THE HEART OF THE CITY
primeLocationDescription: Discover the charm of the city from our prime location. Awaliv International hotel offers easy access to vibrant shopping, dining, and cultural landmarks. Immerse yourself in the local scene while enjoying our world-class amenities.
visualJourney: A Visual Journey Through Our Hotel
galleryDescription: Explore the elegance and luxury of our hotel through this curated gallery. Each image captures the essence of our unique spaces, designed for comfort and sophistication. Experience the beauty and tranquility that await you at every turn.
